sn22.71:1: At Sāvatthī. Then the Venerable Radha approached the Blessed One,sn.iii.80paid homage to him, sat down to one side, and said to him:[n.98] This sutta is identical withSN8.2(andSN22.9), the next withSN8.22(andSN22.92). A whole saṁyutta (SN 23) consists of suttas spoken to the Venerable Radha.
